sentences: Tegelikult on see programm v√§ga huvitav.
Kas sa oled selles programmis osaleja?
Meie kooli programm algab kell 9 hommikul.
context: In Estonian, 'programm' means a plan or sequence of activities. It can refer to a TV/radio program, a computer program (software), an event schedule, or educational curriculum. The word is borrowed from English and has similar meanings across contexts.
